Has Riot every considered RPSale Skins should also be purchasable by IP? Just for the week put an outrageous IP price on the skin, like 10x. So vets with excess IP can find something to use it on. 

It won't help new players at all. But it seems like one possible solution to IP sink. And at 10x, people's accounts will run dry :)

that can be a good idea but whats in it for Riot? if riot gonna do that then the new players would definitely get screwed over and it would affect Riot's relationship with new players. Old players get the opportunity to buy some skins with ip while others have to buy with rp. If you can buy ip with rp then thats a different story.

Again, i am trying to help the community not Riot per se. But happy vets is still happy for Riot although less so.

As a new player, i already feel like lack of IP sucks. But this change wouldnt affect me. Actually it would make me happier since if I really liked a skin I could at least maybe get it, or get some cheap skins.

Maybe they could have a limit pee champ or increasing price per purchase. But those limits both sound terrible.
